episodes.title: Jonestown Fatih, Fear, and Flavor Aid
episodes.description:
In this episode, we peel back the layers of Jim Jones and the tragedy of Jonestown—tracing how a charismatic preacher transformed a movement for justice into one of the deadliest cult catastrophes in modern history. Through survivor accounts, archival audio, and a clear-eyed look at the psychology of control, we follow the path from Indiana revival tents to a remote Guyanese jungle where over 900 lives were lost. This is the story of belief, manipulation, and the devastating cost of unchecked power.
